fullName.label: What is your full name?
fullName.length: Full name must be 500 characters or less.

hasPreviousNames.legend: Have you been known by any previous names?
hasPreviousNames.hint: For example, maiden names or previous married names.
hasPreviousNames.required: Select yes if you have been known by any previous names.
hasPreviousNames.change: Change whether you have been known by any previous names

previousNames.label: What were your previous names?
previousNames.length: Previous names must be 500 characters or less.

nino.label: What is your National Insurance number?
nino.hint: It’s on your National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, ’QQ 12 34 56 C’.
nino.format: Enter your National Insurance number in the correct format.

contactTelephone.label: What is your contact telephone number?
contactTelephone.length: Enter your contact telephone number using 20 characters or less.
contactTelephone.format: Enter your contact telephone number using numbers 0 to 9, spaces, hyphens, brackets and dashes.

registeredBlind.legend: Are you registered blind or severely sight impaired?
registeredBlind.required: Select yes if you are registered blind or severely sight impaired.
registeredBlind.change: Change whether you are registered blind or severely sight impaired

preferredLanguage.legend: What language do you want us to speak to you in?
preferredLanguage.required: Select the language that you want us to speak to you in.
preferredLanguage.change: Change what language you want us to speak to you in

preferredLanguageOther.label: What language do you want us to use?
preferredLanguageOther.required: Enter the language that you want us to use.
preferredLanguageOther.length: Enter the language that you want us to use in 500 characters or less.
preferredLanguageOther.change: Change what language you want us to use

helpWithLettersPhone.legend: Do you need help with letters or phone calls?
helpWithLettersPhone.required: Select yes if you need help with letters or phone calls.
helpWithLettersPhone.change: Change whether you need help with letters or phone calls
